mapper.select: SELECT w.put_time,w.put_order,p.purchaseno,w.put_state,w.put_type,s.sname,r.rname,e.ename ,emp.ename as staff FROM inbound w left join repository r on w.rid = r.rid left join purchase p on W.pid = P.id left join supplier s on w.sid = s.sid left join emp e on W.eid = e.eid left join repository rep on w.rid = rep.rid left join emp on emp.eid = rep.eid
